pages.about-us: About MacaraResort - Luxury Experience in Paradise MacaraResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Luxurious Hotel Rooms Experience luxury like never before with our exquisite hotel rooms at MacaraResort. Each room is designed to provide unparalleled comfort and style, ensuring a relaxing stay for our guests. Deluxe King Room from $299 per night Ocean View Suite from $399 per night Family Villa from $499 per night Book Your Stay Discover Luxury Amenities at MacaraResort! pages.terms-conditions: MacaraResort - Terms and Conditions MacaraResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to MacaraResort! By accessing our website and using our services, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. 1. Booking and Reservations All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Reservations may require advance payment or deposit. 2. Cancellation Policy Cancellation policies vary based on the type of reservation. Please review specific terms provided at the time of booking. 3. Liability MacaraResort is not liable for any loss, damage, injury, or inconvenience caused during your stay, including but not limited to events beyond our control. 4. Privacy Policy Our Privacy Policy governs the collection, use, and protection of your personal information. By using our services, you consent to the terms outlined in our Privacy Policy. 5. Changes to Terms MacaraResort reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
